content: I have a few plated bars to giveaway ¬† silver, gold, gilt plated bars are the three versions! I will choose 3 blocks after we fill up the spots for three winners. One of each version for a total of 3 will be given away. The bars serial numbers will be chosen by me1st block winner gets the gilt version2nd block winner gets the gold version3rd block winner gets the silver versioneach bar will include an acrylic case, box, and 2 DIY holos, or I can do a buyer funded version if you prefer up to you holos will be marked DIY or BF, but no loaded bars for this raffle!A big thank you to all those who have held giveaways/raffles it helps make rough times a little easier for people! I hope this helps in some small way best of luck to you allRULES¬†¬†- Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)¬†¬†- Requirements: Jr Member and up . Below Jr Member you can participate if you have 2+ positive trust or a copper forum membership¬†¬†- no alt accounts please¬†¬†- Last numbers of the hash from the blocks I choose will be the winners.¬†¬†- Shipping is free if you are in the USA if the winner is in another country ¬†I will pay to ship to minerjones then the winner can pay for¬†¬†reshipping through minerjones00 -sam0001 -1miau02 -GazetaBitcoin03 -Thiago00704 -Kaol-8405 -5tift06 -TopTort77707 -suzuki matt08 -Saxoshi09 -Darker45 10 -The_Crypto_Kid11 -Caribbean Treasures12 -heisty13 -geo14 -mole081515- Real-Duke16-Humble Bitcoiners 17 -Crytocanuk18- HouseOfBAMF19 -zukiplay20 - bitbollo21 -2stout22 -Frank AlpenCoin 23 -dwminer124 -Spoki5125 -henkcryptotank26- TxCryptoKid27 -tldr-hodl28 -bct_ail29 - ithd130 -Fundamentals Of 31 -DirtyBirdE ¬†32 -Jambo 33 -Hotdog734 -seek3r35 -Dernoste36 -buckrogers37 -PM-ICT39 -ChiBitCTy 40-PeakDK 41 -Mbitr42 -tweetious43 -Pinky123444- cygan45 -tread9346 -Quaker Bull47 -Bullion-n-BTC48 -NeuroticFish49 -Iced50 -minerjones51 -Ratimov52 -digicoinuser53 - btcoverfiats54 -MoparMiningLLC55 -Michail156 - PawGo 57 - Remsjack58 - bitcoiner24h59 -Dustin westerbeck 60 -inthelongrun61 -Agrawas 62 -F2b63 - doubleU-64 -Buchi-8865 -wwzsocki66 -Soonandwaite 67 -mx12.levins68 -bestcoin_5969 -hookzup170 - slimzak71- owlcatz 72 -bullrun2020bro 73- CryptoYar74 -willi997475 -Getmon76 -Amax77 -busminer78 -Yoda79 -Abiky 80 -Polymerbit81 -CoinageMint82 -SatsLife 83 -haloxon84 -Sunny85 -Markzellers86 -examplens87 -kryptowerk88 -krogoth89 -Rizzrack90 -xSlyy91 -Spray.92 -Otillio 93 -Cryptogreatdane94 -transvestite lamb95 -Mauser96 -Mortare97 -Doblezero98 -turbodogma99 -JanEmil
